message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,500. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $13,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While $13,000 is a step in the right direction, I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm willing to come down to $13,800, but I don't think I can go lower than that. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the effort. I would like to propose a price of $13,500. This seems to be a fair compromise given the value of the product to me.
